articles.description: An improved jab that will be more effective against variants can be made quickly, says Oxford-AstraZeneca.
articles.content:
By Nick Triggle and Philippa RoxbyBBC News
image copyrightGetty Images
A vaccine to tackle the coronavirus variants could be ready to deploy by the autumn should it be needed, the Oxford-AstraZenec… [+3354 chars]
